answers.answer: Pains on our right side could just be baby stretching out! I had the same pains around that time. Its called ligament pain. U do need to let the doctor know BC depending on.the pain and other symptoms, it could be a sign of preeclampsia

Hello,  it could be nothing but be cautious, when i was 22 weeks with my first pregnancy i had right side pain and. I. Did not go away i ended up having to have my gallbladder out. Listen to your body. If it does not feel right go to the dr. Best of luck. Congratulations

question: I've just entres 22 weeks this morning but  yesterday evening I was laying down and I could feel pains on the right side of my belly. It came and went. But during the night I was also experiencing other types of pain on the same side. It's it normal? Should I be worried?Helllppp please!
